pages.text: 10|34|illeogalodoe neohui dongbanjadeul gaunde changjohayeo geoduneun jaga iss neunyo mul-eobola tto illeogalodoe ha nanim-i changjohasigo tto geodusimae eotteohge geoyeoghalyeo haneunyo

10|35|illeogalodoe neohui dongbanjadeul gaunde jinlileul indohaneun jaga iss neunyo illeogalodoe hananim-i jinlilo indohasim-ila geuleomeulo jinlilo in dohasineun bun-eul ttaleugessneunyo animyeon jinlilo indohaji moshaneun geos-eul tta leugessneunyo neohuineun eotteohanyo eotteohge panjeonghaneunyo

10|36|geuleona geudeul daedasuneun ttaleu ji anihago gongsang-e jibchaghani sillogeu gongsang-eun jinlieseo beos-eona muyonghalppun-ila sillo hananim-eun geudeul-i haenghaneun modeun geos-eul algo gyesinila

10|37|i kkulan-eun hananib-i anin da leun geos-eulo inhayeo iss-eul su eobs-eumyeo ijeon-e gyesidoen geos-eul hwagjeunghago geu seongseoui malsseum-eul seolmyeonghagi wihae gye sidoeeoss-euni ineun man-yuui junim-eulo buteo on geos-i teullim-eobsnola

10|38|geuga geugeos-eul wijohayeossda mal hadeonyo illeogalodoe neohuiga jinjeong jinsilhan jadeul-ilamyeon geuwa gat-eun mal sseum-eul gajyeoola hago neohuiui him-eul dahayeo hananim oee guwon-eul hayeo bola

10|39|geuleona geudeul-eun geojishamyeo ttohan alji moshadeola ttohan haemyeongdo geudeul-ege ileuji moshadeola icheoleomgeudeul ijeon-ui baegseongdeuldo geojishayeoss-euni umaehan jadeul-ui malloga eotteohge doegessneunyo
10|40|geudeul gaunde midneun jaga issgogeudeul gaunde midji anihan jaga iss-euna geudaeui junim-eun haeagjadeul-eul algo gyesim-ila

10|41|man-il geudeul-i geudaeege geojishandamyeon illeogalodoe naegeneun naui il-i issgo neohuiegen neohuiui il-i iss-euni neohuineun naega haneun-il-e chaeg im-i eobs-eumyeo naneun neohuiga haneun il-e chaeg-im-i eobsda hala
10|42|geudeul gaunde geudaeege gwileul giul-inja iss-euna gwimeogeoliyo i seong-i eobsneun geudeullo hayeogeum geudaeneun deudge hal su issgessneunyo
